dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 716 IH: Fill the Lake Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Zinke introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to ensure full pool levels of Flathead Lake in Montana in accordance with certain requirements, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fill the Lake Act.

section.header: Regulation of Pool Level of Flathead Lake
section.text: From June 15 through September 15 of each calendar year, the Secretary of the Interior shall ensure—

paragraph.text: a minimum lake level in Flathead Lake of 2892’ MSL by providing the water from Hungry Horse Reservoir; and
a maximum lake level in Flathead Lake of 2893’ MSL by releasing excess water downstream.
